#include <iostream>
using namespace std;

int main() {
    int n;
    cin >> n;
    int arr[n][n];
    int x,y;
    if(n%2==1){
        x=n/2;
        y=x;
    }
    else{
        x=n/2;
        y=x-1;
    }
    int val=1;
    int count=1;
    arr[x][y]=1;
    val++;
    while(count<=n-1){
        if(count%2==1){
            for(int i=0;i<count;i++){
                y++;
                arr[x][y]=val;
                val++;
            }
            for(int i=0;i<count;i++){
                x--;
                arr[x][y]=val;
                val++;
            }
            count++;
        }
        else{
            for(int i=0;i<count;i++){
                y--;
                arr[x][y]=val;
                val++;
            }
            for(int i=0;i<count;i++){
                x++;
                arr[x][y]=val;
                val++;
            }
            count++;
        }
    }
    if(n%2==0){
        while(y>0){
            y--;
            arr[x][y]=val;
            val++;
        }
    }
    else{
        while(y<n-1){
            y++;
            arr[x][y]=val;
            val++;
        }
    }
    for(int i=0;i<n;i++){
        for(int j=0;j<n;j++){
            cout << arr[i][j] << ' ';
        }
        cout << endl;
    }
	// your code goes here
	return 0;
}
